Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Ogre::D3D11Mappings::eD3DFilterUsage

enum identifying D3D11 filter usage type

Enumerator:
D3D_FUSAGE_MIN 

min filter

D3D_FUSAGE_MAG 

mag filter

D3D_FUSAGE_MIP 

mip filter
